ROOT.QUERY: WITH MAX_LV AS ( SELECT ar_donord donord, ar_cproin ITEM_CODE, MAX(ar_ilogis) LV FROM tb_art@heinens_custom_prod WHERE ar_stprod in (0,2) GROUP BY ar_donord, ar_cproin) SELECT ar_donord "Whs", ar_cproin || ''/'' ||ar_ilogis || '' '' || ar_libpro "Item/lv description", ar_fourn || '' | '' || ar_nrsfou "Supplier desc", (SELECT ea_ean13 FROM tb_ean@heinens_stk_prod WHERE ar_cproin||ar_ilogis||ar_donord = ea_cproin||ea_ilogis||ea_donord AND ea_typcod IN (6,7) AND ROWNUM=1) "UPC", /* Pick slot */ (SELECT rp_adrpic FROM tb_pick@heinens_stk_prod WHERE ar_cproin||ar_ilogis||ar_donord = rp_cproin||rp_ilogis||rp_donord AND rownum=1) as "Picking address", DECODE(ar_codeup,1, ''SKU'', 2, ''Inner'', 3, ''Case'', 4, ''Layer'', 5, ''Pallet'', ar_codeup) "Prep. unit", ar_poinet "SKU net weight (lbs)", ar_nuvspc*ar_nspcca "Nb Sku per case", ar_poinet*ar_nuvspc*ar_nspcca "Calculation case weight (lbs)", ar_pdscar "Case net weight (lbs)", /* Inventory */ (SELECT SUM(ul_nqteup) INV_PU FROM TB_EUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD, TB_LCUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD WHERE UL_USSCC = UE_USSCC AND UE_INDFIC = ''1'' AND ul_cproin = ar_cproin AND ul_ilogis = ar_ilogis AND ul_arprom=ar_arprom AND UL_DONORD = ar_donord) "Inventory (case)" FROM tb_art@heinens_custom_prod, artvl@heinens_custom_prod, MAX_LV WHERE ((ar_donord in (90061, 95073,95074) AND &PARAM2=2) OR (ar_donord IN (91070, 91071, 91072) AND &PARAM2=1)) AND ar_cproin=ITEM_CODE AND ar_ilogis=LV AND ar_donord=donord and ar_stprod in (0,2) AND ABS(ar_poinet*ar_nuvspc*ar_nspcca - ar_pdscar) > 1 AND arlcexr=ar_cproin AND arlcexvl=to_number(ar_ilogis)
